duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide administrative support to the Las Vegas office and leadership team.
Act as the first point of contact/receptionist for visitors to the office and assist with warehouse tasks.
Enter orders, ensure product availability, and handle pack & ship orders.
Maintain inventory of office supplies, manage package deliveries, and stock product received.
Coordinate employee events and perform daily/weekly housekeeping duties.
Work with the landlord/building management and third-party vendors to ensure office functions remain seamless.
